|brand = TP-LINK |model = TL-ER604 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = W |revision = v1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = July 1, 2013 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/TP-LINK_TL-ER604W |wlclass = N300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router, VPN Router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = TE7ER604WV1 |icid = 8853A-ER604WV1 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 2021500144 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->

|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q64BVSIG; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5PS5162GFR; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Atheros;AR8327N; |wan_ports = 2 |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 3 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->

|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 07/01/2013 |estreldate = 06/10/2013 |estprice = 120 |upc = 845973041212 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00DBX9HPC |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "2021500144" and "Rev:1.0" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. *The Flash chip used may be a 8MB W25Q64BVSIG (or something like that). *It would appear the device is using an ''[[Atheros]]'' AR934x WiSoC :(... or some other similarly specced WiSoC).
The manual states that the device is using.. *A MIPS32 network processor *64MB of DDR2 RAM
''TP-LINK'' specifies the device has 4kV lightning protection.. :hence the ''SafeStream'' designation.
The power supply shown in the FCC photos is a ''TP-LINK'' branded :T120100-2B1 (100-240VAC ~ 50/60Hz, 0.3A -> 12VDC, 1A).
==Links of Interest== *[http://www.tp-link.com/resources/document/TL-ER604W_V1_Datasheet.pdf Datasheet] *[http://www.tp-link.us/resources/simulator/TL-ER604W/userRpm/Index.htm Interface simulator]
==See also== *[[TP-LINK TL-ER7206]] - SafeStream Dual-WAN VPN Router • [https://www.foxnetwork.ru/index.php/reviews/36-reviews/reviews/237-safestream-multi-wan-vpn-tp-link-tl-er7206 Teardown] :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7621A @880MHz, [[Realtek]] RTL8367S • [https://www.mbreviews.com/tp-link-tl-er7206-multi-wan-review/ MBR] *[[TP-LINK TL-ER6120]] - SafeStream Dual-WAN VPN Router *[[TP-LINK TL-ER6020]] - SafeStream Dual-WAN VPN Router • [https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/lanwan/lanwan-reviews/tp-link-tl-er6020-safestream-gigabit-dual-wan-vpn-router-reviewed/ SNB] :CPU: [[Cavium]] CNS3411 @600MHz, 16MB/128MB, [[Realtek]] RTL8367RB *[[TP-LINK TL-ER5120]] - Load Balance Broadband Gigabit Router (4x WAN) :v2: CPU: [[Cavium]] Dual-Core @500MHz [https://www.snbforums.com/threads/tp-link-tl-er5120-multiwan-router-350mb-throughput-for-250-anyone-use-this.6612/ MIPS64], Flash: 8MB, RAM: 128MB *[[TP-LINK TL-R600VPN]] - SafeStream Gigabit Broadband VPN Cable Router :CPU: [[Realtek]] RTL8198 (-GR), Flash: 8MB, RAM: 64MB • [https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/lanwan/lanwan-reviews/32424-tp-link-tl-r600vpn-safestream-gigabit-broadband-vpn-router-reviewed SNB Review] <!--(2021500127)--> *[[TP-LINK TL-R470T+]] - Load Balance Broadband Router (4x WAN) :v6.0 - CPU: [[Realtek]] RTL8197 (-GR), Flash: 4MB, RAM: 32/64MB *[[TP-LINK TL-R480T+]] - Load Balance Broadband Router (2x WAN) :v2/v3 - CPU: [[Intel]] FWIXP420BB (@266MHz), Switch: [[Marvell]] 88E6063 :v4/v5 - CPU: [[Realtek]]
